cmp: 兼 (double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time)

exm.mng: modest, self-effacing, to make modest remarks
Nangqên county (Tibetan: nang chen rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
(idiom) complacency leads to loss, modesty brings profit, pride comes before a fall
exm.pyn: mǎn zhāo sǔn , qiān shòu yì

exm.mng: Nangqên county (Tibetan: nang chen rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
humble words, self-deprecatory expression, to modestly decline
(idiom) complacency leads to loss, modesty brings profit, pride comes before a fall
exm.pyn: mǎn zhāo sǔn , qiān shòu yì
